content:
WindowStartupLocation Enum

Definition

Specifies the position that a Window will be shown in when it is first opened. Used by the stem.Windows.Window.WindowStartupLocation* property.

In this Article

[System.Windows.Localizability(System.Windows.LocalizationCategory.None, Readability=System.Windows.Readability.Unreadable)]
public enum WindowStartupLocation
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
WindowStartupLocation

Fields

CenterOwner

The startup location of a Window is the center of the Window that owns it, as specified by the stem.Windows.Window.Owner* property.
CenterScreen

The startup location of a Window is the center of the screen that contains the mouse cursor.
Manual

The startup location of a Window is set from code, or defers to the default Windows location.
